Artwork by the children of Gaza

Limited Edition 2025 DIY Printable Calendar

R460 ($25)R525 ($29)

This calendar is dedicated to all those who have lost their lives in Gaza. As a global community, we need to be better.

In previous years, our annual calendars showcased moments from our travels. For 2025, we are honored to present a calendar unlike any we've created before. Instead of travel photos, we proudly bought 12 deeply moving artworks by the children of Gaza to feature. The calendar highlights significant religious events and holidays, serving as both a practical tool and a heartfelt tribute.

Every purchase supports these young artists, who receive royalties for each copy sold.

There are also humanitarian quotes on each month- things that I think about, speak about and have written on social media.

Let 2025 be a year of freedom for Palestine. Insha'Allah.

*For discounts on bulk orders please email hello@candyandtheking.com

★★★★★

Featuring 12 deeply moving pieces of art created by children from Gaza

Each child receives royalties for each copy sold.

  • ✓ Palestine in my country

  • ✓ My entire family is dead

  • ✓ Running from the flames

Step 1: choose how much you would like to give. Step 2: click the floating blue button below. Step 3: Check your email for the download link. Step 4: Print your calendar at a nearby printer or at home!

Religious Holy Days

30+ significant days including Islamic, Bahá’í, Christian, Hindu and Buddhist holy days.

  • ✓ Ramadan
  • ✓ Mawlid al-Nabi
  • ✓ Good Friday
  • ✓ Eid al-Fitr
  • ✓ Diwali
  • ✓ Christmas
  • ✓ Ridvan Festival
  • ✓ Buddha Day
  • and many, many more!

Supporting Gaza, Palestine

After visiting Palestine, our outlook on the humanitarian catastrophe was forever changed. Then October 2023 happened… We will never be the same after seeing the genocide unfold. For this reason, we bought artwork from displaced Gazan children and will also be paying them royalties for each copy sold.

 

More info

This printable calendar can be taken to your local printers for customization, allowing you to tailor it to your preferences and budget. Please keep in mind we are a small family business working on an honesty policy of one download and one printed copy per purchase. Thank you so much for supporting us and this cause which is so, so close to our heart!

 

*Notice: we have removed all Israeli national holidays listed on the official Israeli government website from our calendar as part of a boycott against the ongoing humanitarian crisis in Gaza.
